Major_Arcs.title: Introduction of The Human Meteor and Initial Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic book and the Human Meteor, establishing his origin and initial confrontation with underwater threats and land-based attackers.

sub_scenes.title: Comic Book Introduction and Underwater Threat
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the comic book, the hero, and the initial underwater setting and threat.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi Ride and Waterfront Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Duke starts his day as a taxi driver, encounters suspicious passengers and is then ambushed at the waterfront, leading to his transformation.

narrative_arcs.title: Pursuit and Ambush at the Pier

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Intervention and Initial Success
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor confronts his attackers, receives praise from the police, and then gets briefed on a new mission at the hospital.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Infiltration Plan and Stowaway
sub_scenes.description: Duke plans to infiltrate the suspicious yacht and sends Toby ahead, but his stowaway attempt is quickly discovered.

sub_scenes.title: Toby's Undercover Mission and Submarine Discovery
sub_scenes.description: Toby, undercover as 'Pete', infiltrates the yacht, gets caught, but his mission is revealed to be successful as he discovers the submarine and his true identity is disclosed.

narrative_arcs.title: Return, Submarine Discovery, and Mission Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Submarine Attack and Underwater Combat
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor and allied divers engage with enemy divers near the submarine, leading to underwater combat and strategic retreat.

sub_scenes.title: Torpedo Attack and Ship Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor attacks the submarine with a torpedo and then shifts his focus to the ship above, leading to a surface confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Mission Success
sub_scenes.description: Human Meteor boards the yacht, investigates Peter's fate, finds the depth map, and briefs the Navy, leading to a successful mission and domestic closure.

narrative_arcs.title: Informing the Navy about Peter's Map
Evening Drive and Bedtime for Toby

Major_Arcs.title: Liberty Lads vs. Nazi Fiends and Ambulance Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to the Liberty Lads fighting Nazis and introduces a separate mystery involving an ambulance, a dropped wallet, and a bus garage.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Combat Nazi Enemies
sub_scenes.description: The Liberty Lads are in a firefight with Nazi Fiends.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Wallet Clue
sub_scenes.description: Two boys observe an ambulance and find a dropped wallet that leads them to a bus garage.

narrative_arcs.title: Wallet Discovery and Bus Garage Clue

sub_scenes.title: Bus Garage Encounter and Threat from Mr. Horst
sub_scenes.description: The boys reach the bus garage, witness a marine saluting a civilian, and are then confronted and threatened by Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Chasing the Bus for Wallet Return
Waiting on the Bench and Approaching Threat

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Violent Plot, and Bronson's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Mr. Horst interrogates the boys, a violent plan against them is hatched, but Major Bronson intervenes with his own sinister alternative.

sub_scenes.title: Chaos, Capture, and Bronson's Deadly Turn
sub_scenes.description: A fight breaks out, the boys are captured, threatened by Horst, but Bronson unexpectedly turns violent and shoots Horst's henchman.

narrative_arcs.title: Initial Melee and Call to Stop

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Sabotage Plans, and Marine Barracks Attack
sub_scenes.description: The boys escape and seek help from Marines, while one boy discovers sabotage plans, leading to an attack on the Marine Barracks.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Marine Help at the Waterfront
Discovery and Confrontation in the Secret Office

sub_scenes.title: Barracks Chaos and Nazi Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Skip defends himself amidst chaos, while Major Bronson is confronted by Nazis, revealing the attackers' identity.

sub_scenes.title: Marine Intervention, Resolution, and Series Promotion
sub_scenes.description: Marines intervene, combat ensues, Major Bronson is injured but recovers, and the Nazi spy ring is dismantled, concluding with a series promotion.

narrative_arcs.title: Resolution and Congratulations for Stopping Nazi Spies

Major_Arcs.title: Champ and Henry in South American Intrigue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Champ and Henry in a South American setting, entangled in intrigue related to Rosita's kidnapping and Axis agents.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Champ and Henry and South American Setting
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Champ and Henry and their entanglement in a South American intrigue.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of Champ and Henry in Intrigue

sub_scenes.title: Officers' Suspicious Actions and Rosita's Kidnapping
sub_scenes.description: Officers are seen arresting and questioning civilians, revealing the context of Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre and Axis involvement.

narrative_arcs.title: Escort to Consul and Investigation Inquiry
Explanation of Rosita's Kidnapping and Suspicion

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Plot and Capture of Champ and Henry
sub_scenes.description: El Tigre's plan is discussed, and Champ and Henry are captured by El Tigre's men, leading to an unexpected encounter with 'Mama'.

sub_scenes.title: Rescue Plan and Infiltration of El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: A plan to rescue Rosita by infiltrating El Tigre's hideout is formed and executed, utilizing diversion tactics.

narrative_arcs.title: Planning the Approach to El Tigre
Approaching Guards and Confrontation with El Tigre

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation, Twist, and Search for Rosita
sub_scenes.description: Interrogation of a captured man reveals a twist about Axis agents, and the search for Rosita continues unsuccessfully in one location.

narrative_arcs.title: Interrogation and Twist Regarding Axis Agents

sub_scenes.title: Clarification about El Tigre and Rescue Mission Launch
sub_scenes.description: Misunderstanding about El Tigre is clarified, and news of Rosita's location leads to the launch of a rescue mission against Axis agents.

narrative_arcs.title: Misunderstanding and Clarification about El Tigre
Rosita's Location Revealed and Rescue Mission Initiated

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit, Infiltration, and Rescue of Rosita
sub_scenes.description: The rescue mission proceeds with pursuit, forced entry, strategic maneuvering, and finally, the successful infiltration and rescue of Rosita.

sub_scenes.title: Combat, Gratitude, and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Close combat ensues, Rosita is rescued, expresses gratitude, and the government troops arrive, leading to the resolution and series promotion.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival of Government Forces and Manhunt

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan in Jungle Adventure and Sub Detector Plans
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, dealing with international spies and the threat to sub detector plans, involving capture, torture, and native tribes.

sub_scenes.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Combat and Military Briefing
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and the subsequent military briefing regarding his actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle Combat and Introduction of Devil Dog Dolan
Reassurance and Trust in Dolan's Intentions

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Arrival, Observation, and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: Dolan arrives in the jungle, is observed, and another character is ambushed by natives.

sub_scenes.title: Capture, Torture, and Plan Extraction
sub_scenes.description: Captured soldier is brought before Grauer, soldiers suspect Dolan, orders for interrogation are given, and torture is used to extract plans.

sub_scenes.title: Arson, Marine Attack, and Dolan's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: Arson is confessed, a marine attack starts, and Dolan intervenes, leading to Grauer's orders and destructive fire.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine's Attack and Attempt to Stop Him
Burning Native Huts and Flames' Surge
Arsonist's Gloating and Reassurance to Sam

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Attack, Chief's Death, and Native Liberation
sub_scenes.description: Devil Dog Dolan attacks natives, leading to the chief's accidental death and the liberation of the tribe from a betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: Chief's Death and Native Homage to Marine
Explanation of Chief's Betrayal and Liberation
Post-Conflict Dialogue and Pursuit of Grauer

sub_scenes.title: Captain's Dilemma, Son's Confrontation, and Sam's Onslaught
sub_scenes.description: Captain faces dilemma, son confronts him, revealing Sam's identity, leading to Sam's violent fight on the ship.

sub_scenes.title: Resolution, Order Rescinded, and Disciplinary Action
sub_scenes.description: Surrender order is rescinded, Dolan is commended, and he carries out disciplinary action by spanking an officer.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Twinkle Twins and their investigation into the murder of banker Robert Burgess, involving racketeering, sick children, and community blood donation.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins and Murder Assignment
sub_scenes.description: Introduction of the Twinkle Twins and their assignment to investigate the banker murder case.

narrative_arcs.title: The News Assignment and Initial Clues

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Investigation and Barnacci Suspicion
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane investigate at the hospital, find Miss Reilly sick, and develop suspicions about Barnacci's racketeering.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Investigation and Miss Reilly's Condition

sub_scenes.title: Phoning Elijah and Startling News
sub_scenes.description: Dan calls Elijah from a candy store and receives startling news connecting Farnacci to the murder.

narrative_arcs.title: Phoning Elijah from the Candy Store

sub_scenes.title: Search in Irish Section and Mrs. Murphy's Invitation
sub_scenes.description: Dan and Diane search for Tom Reilly in the Irish section and are invited in by Mrs. Murphy.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Tom Reilly in the Irish Section

sub_scenes.title: Exoneration of Reilly and Farnacci's Blood Transfusion
sub_scenes.description: Mrs. Murphy exonerates Reilly and reveals Farnacci's unexpected blood transfusion for Reilly's daughter.

narrative_arcs.title: Farnacci's Blood Transfusion and Mob Threat

sub_scenes.title: Taxi Arrival, Reilly's Escape, and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Taxi arrives, Reilly attempts to escape, and Dan and Diane give chase.

sub_scenes.title: Street Brawl, Police Intervention, and Vehicle Apprehension
sub_scenes.description: A street brawl erupts, police intervene, and the chase vehicles are apprehended.

sub_scenes.title: Emergency Transport, Hospital Wait, and Blood Transfusion Need
sub_scenes.description: Emergency transport of shooting victim, anxious wait at hospital, and diagnosis revealing Mrs. Murphy needs blood transfusion.

narrative_arcs.title: Diagnosis: Blood Transfusion Needed for Mrs. Murphy

sub_scenes.title: Blood Donor Appeal, Donation, and Reilly's Recovery
sub_scenes.description: Community appeals for blood donors, blood donation process starts, and Tom Reilly recovers after transfusion.

narrative_arcs.title: Seeking Blood Donors and Initial Mismatch
Urgent Call for Blood Donors for Tom Reilly
Community Response and Arrival of Blood Donors
Blood Type Verification and Donation Process
Blood Transfusion and Tom Reilly's Recovery

sub_scenes.title: Anticipation for Information, Justice Demand, and Farnacci's Arrest
sub_scenes.description: Anticipation for Reilly's information, public demand for justice, police raid and apprehension of Farnacci and his gang.

narrative_arcs.title: Anticipation of Tom Reilly Revealing Information
Demand for Justice and Plan to Capture Farnacci
Police Pursuit and Raid to Arrest Farnacci
Confrontation and Apprehension at the Poolroom

sub_scenes.title: Birthday Party Celebration and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: A celebratory birthday party for Reilly's daughter marks the positive resolution of the case.

narrative_arcs.title: Celebratory Birthday Party for Reilly's Daughter
